item.title: Valve: 'It would be fun to remake Half-Life 1'
item.dc:creator: DEATH_eVADER
item.description:
Imagine that Valve had finally finished producing the new SDK/hammer toolset to make it easy for both developers and the community to work with. Now hold on to that image, and to validate the tools effectiveness, they speed-develop the original levels of HL1 from memory and from scratch. If they managed to finish the game within a certain time, they give it to the community for free. If they don’t, then Ep3 is delayed further till the toolset is ready to be shipped alongside the game. HL1 and Ep3 is then shipped together as a special edition boxset

Agreed. I suggest playing HL1 before Black Mesa because you get to see it and why it became so awesome that the devs wanted to create Black Mesa in the first place.
